main event: A bright white light was reported moving at great speed over Shark River, New Jersey, on January 9, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 to 20 seconds., The observation occurred under overcast sky conditions., The object's course was described as erratic., The object resembled a distant light and was reported through cloud cover., Conclusions from the investigation suggested it may have been a balloon.
witness description: lookout tower and Coast Guard station personnel
